```{r,include=FALSE}
library(DEVISE)
```

```{r,include=FALSE}
Outcome <- c(0, 0, 3, 5, 4, 7, 4, 9)
```

## DEVISE: One Sample t Test

### Descriptive Statistics

```{r}
(Outcome) |> describeMoments()
```

### Inferential Statistics

```{r}
(Outcome) |> estimateMeans(mu = 7)
```

```{r}
(Outcome) |> testMeans(mu = 7)
```

```{r}
(Outcome) |> standardizeMeans(mu = 7)
```
